meanings.definition: A government that has authority over other governments.
meanings.sent1: The supergovernments work together to make important decisions.
meanings.sent2: The supergovernments meet annually to discuss global issues.
meanings.sent3: The supergovernments had a picnic to show their authority over smaller governments.
meanings.sent4: In the world of politics, supergovernments reign supreme.
meanings.sent5: The concept of supergovernments can be complex but is crucial for global governance.

meanings.definition: The highest level of government in a hierarchical system.
meanings.sent1: At the top of the hierarchy sits the supergovernments.
meanings.sent2: The supergovernments oversee all lower levels of government.
meanings.sent3: The supergovernments organized a talent show to assert their position in the hierarchy.
meanings.sent4: In the pyramid of power, supergovernments stand at the pinnacle.
meanings.sent5: The image of supergovernments at the apex of the system is striking and memorable.
